publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3962 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Scottish Public Services Ombudsman Act 2002 (Amendment) Order 2009—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Scottish Public Services Ombudsman Act 2002 (Amendment) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*

S3M-3962 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Scottish Public Services Ombudsman Act 2002 (Amendment) Order 2009—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Scottish Public Services Ombudsman Act 2002 (Amendment) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing
